sentences.en: "Today?" — "I'd assume so, yeah."
sentences.cn: “今天？”——“对，我觉得是。”

sentences.en: Andy assumed an air of indifference whenever her name was mentioned.
sentences.cn: 每次提到她的名字，安迪都装出无所谓的样子。

sentences.en: Fish populations assume highly localized distributions within each river.
sentences.cn: 鱼群分布集中在每条河的某些区域.

sentences.en: He assumed power in a bloody coup in 1990.
sentences.cn: 他在1990年一场血腥的政变中上台。

sentences.en: I assume that he won't cheat you.
sentences.cn: 想来他是不会骗你的.

sentences.en: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.cn: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.en: I think we can safely assume that this situation will continue.
sentences.cn: 我想我们可以有把握地认为这种情况将持续下去.

sentences.en: It is reasonable to assume that he knew beforehand that this would happen.
sentences.cn: 有理由认为他事先就知道会发生这样的事。

sentences.en: It's risky to assume that we know what voters will be thinking in a year's time.
sentences.cn: 自以为我们了解投票人在一年后的想法是很危险的行为。

sentences.en: Jim Paton will assume the role of managing director.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·帕顿将出任常务董事一职。

sentences.en: Let us assume those clubs actually win something. Then players will receive large bonuses.
sentences.cn: 倘若那些俱乐部真的赚了，那么球员就会获得一大笔奖金。

sentences.en: Let's assume for a moment that I am a litigant in your court.
sentences.cn: 暂且假设我是你的诉讼当事人。

sentences.en: Mr Cross will assume the role of Chief Executive with a team of four directors.
sentences.cn: 克劳斯先生将出任首席执行官，手下有4位经理。

sentences.en: People assume they know me through and through the moment we meet.
sentences.cn: 人们一见到我，就自以为对我了如指掌了。

sentences.en: Putting two and two together, I assume that this was the car he used.
sentences.cn: 根据我的了解，我猜想这是他曾开过的车子。

sentences.en: The problem is beginning to assume mammoth proportions.
sentences.cn: 这个问题开始显得十分重大.

sentences.en: These relationships assume great importance in times of crisis.
sentences.cn: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

sentences.en: They naively assume things can only get better.
sentences.cn: 他们天真地以为情况只会变好.

sentences.en: We can't assume anything in this case.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下我们不可能做出假设.

sentences.en: We can't just assume her guilt.
sentences.cn: 我们不能想当然地认为她有罪.

sentences.en: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.cn: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

sentences.en: Whoever they appoint will assume responsibility for all financial matters.
sentences.cn: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

trans.tran_cn: 假设，认为，承担（责任），获得（权利），呈现，假装
trans.tran_en: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof
to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof
